title: Calories in Basmati Rice
meta_description: Learn calories in rice basmati per 100g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition details for easy tracking.
assumptions: Cooked white basmati rice, plain boiled, no added oil, salt, or seasonings; drained.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cooking method, water absorption, and whether white or brown; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of cooked basmati rice provides ~130 kcal and 28g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp oil during cooking per 100g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g cooked basmati rice?
faqs.a: About 130 kcal for plain cooked white basmati rice.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in basmati rice?
faqs.a: Around 28g carbs per 100g cooked, mostly starch with 0.4g fiber.

faqs.q: Is basmati rice high in protein?
faqs.a: No, about 2.7g protein per 100g cooked; it's carb-focused.

faqs.q: Calories in brown vs white basmati rice?
faqs.a: Brown has ~120 kcal per 100g cooked, slightly less than white's 130 kcal.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in rice basmati?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”frying or adding oil increases calories; boiling plain keeps it lowest.
